argumentText:
ARGUMENT
b i j m

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | m2cpm.s | |- S = ( N ConstPolyMat R ) |
| 2 |  | m2cpm.t | |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) |
| 3 |  | m2cpm.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 4 |  | m2cpm.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> N e. Fin ) |
| 6 | 5, 5 | #P_jca | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( N e. Fin /\ N e. Fin ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ m e. B ) -> ( N e. Fin /\ N e. Fin ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_mpt2exga | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ N e. Fin ) -> ( i e. N , j e. N |-> ( ( algSc ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) ` ( i m j ) ) ) e. _V ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ m e. B ) -> ( i e. N , j e. N |-> ( ( algSc ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) ` ( i m j ) ) ) e. _V ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Poly1 ` R ) = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( algSc ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) = ( algSc ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) |
| 12 | 2, 3, 4, 10, 11 | #P_mat2pmatfval | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> T = ( m e. B |-> ( i e. N , j e. N |-> ( ( algSc ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) ` ( i m j ) ) ) ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_m2cpm | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ b e. B ) -> ( T ` b ) e. S ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_3expa | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ b e. B ) -> ( T ` b ) e. S ) |
| 15 | 9, 12, 14 | #P_fmpt2d | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> T : B --> S ) |
